description: Polynomial Generalized Cartan Matrices like the B_n type: m4by4={{2, -1, 0, 0}, {-1, 2, -1, 0}, {0, -1, 2, -n}, {0, 0, -1, 2}} For B_4 the n=2: here n=3 is used in the general n X n matrix polynomials P(n,x). Since the C_n types are symmetrical, they have the same polynomials. For 2 X 2 this n=3 is the G_2 14 dimensional exceptional group.
